Today, he serves as a guardian spirit for a powerful warlord—will allow her spirit to rest. his former forest home, possessing despoilers of nature by But she can’t complete the task without help. She requires way of his malevolence ability and using the captured hosts to a living vessel to leave the ruins of Brightwater Reach.
